name: CNN
text: Satellite images show smoke covering much of the Pacific coastline, with major cities there seeing high Air Quality Index numbers. That's a problem for the elderly and young children, as well as those with asthma and Covid-19 or other breathing conditions. https://t.co/rcYw6LhJgk

name: CNN
text: Rep. Tom Graves, a Republican representing Georgia's 14th Congressional District, has announced that he is planning to step down from Congress in October https://t.co/bQpfeOwS7t

name: CNN
text: The Treasury Department has so far withheld in 2020 approximately $1.5 million from a New York City Fire Department health care program for those who worked at Ground Zero following the 9/11 attacks, according to letters from New York Rep. Peter King https://t.co/atTW5Bpd2M

name: CNN
